data.name: kstidAutoAcceptMergeProgress
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when auto-merging differences for streamlined Paratext import

data.name: kstidAutoMerged
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog box when the imported version of the book contains new material that has been merged in successfully (i.e., without having to replace any existing material).

data.name: kstidAutoMerging
data.value: Replacing range of imported sections in current version of {0}...
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when replacing range in imported version.

data.name: kstidBTNoCorrespondingParaDetails
data.value: No vernacular paragraph could be found having style "{0}" and containing "{1}".

data.name: kstidBTStyleMismatchDetails
data.value: The style "{0}" does not match the vernacular paragraph style "{1}".

data.name: kstidCheckParatextInstallation
data.value: Problem communicating with Paratext. Please ensure that Paratext is correctly installed.
data.comment: Error message when we are unable to load the Paratext objects required for importing a Paratext project

data.name: kstidConfirmBookOverwriteAfterMerge
data.value:
You have reviewed some differences between the imported version and the current version of {0}.
Do you want to replace the range in the current version with the imported version?
To keep the decisions you made in the Compare and Merge Versions dialog box, click No.
data.comment: Message displayed in Imported Books dialog box (parameter 0 is the name of the book) if user clicks Overwrite button after using the Compare and Merge dialog box to merge one or more of the differences.

data.name: kstidConfirmOverwriteBackTrans
data.comment: Message displayed in Imported Books dialog box if user confirms that they want to Replace Range in a book even though they may lose back translation data. Parameter 0: "imported" or "saved", Parameter 1: language name, Parameter 2: book name, Parameter 3: Scripture references

data.name: kstidConfirmOverwriteBackTransCaption
data.value: Confirm Potential Loss of Back Translation
data.comment: Caption on message box displayed in Imported Books dialog box if user confirms that they want to Replace Range in a book even though they may lose back translation data.

data.name: kstidConfirmStopImport
data.value: If you stop importing right now, you will have successfully imported everything up to and including {0}. Are you sure you want to stop importing? (Click No to continue importing.)
data.comment: MessageBox prompt

data.name: kstidDataLossCaption
data.comment: Caption for message displayed in Imported Books dialog box and Saved and Imported Versions dialog box

data.name: kstidDataLossMsg
data.comment: Message displayed in Imported Books dialog box and Saved and Imported Versions dialog box (parameter 0 is "imported" or "saved"; parameter 1 is the name of the book, parameter 2 is the list of content that will be deleted)

data.name: kstidIdentical
data.value: No differences found in vernacular text (back translation not compared)
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there are no differences between the imported version of a book and the current version

data.name: kstidImport
data.comment: Undo/Redo string for File/Import

data.name: kstidImported
data.comment: The article, adjective and noun are included to accomodate languages with different word order.

data.name: kstidImportFinalizing
data.comment: Status message in progress dialog when import is finishing and views are being refreshed

data.name: kstidImportingAnnotations
data.comment: Display for Progress Dialog when importing Annotations (Parameter will be a vernacular book name)

data.name: kstidImportingBackTranslation
data.comment: Display for Progress Dialog when importing a back translation (Parameter will be a vernacular book name)

data.name: kstidImportingBook
data.comment: Display for Progress Dialog when importing (Parameter will be a vernacular book name)

data.name: kstidImportInitializing
data.comment: Status message in progress dialog when import is initializing

data.name: kstidImportNoBookError
data.value: No Standard Format files were found for the import range {0}-{1}
data.comment: Message text when an import contains no books.

data.name: kstidImportProgressCaption
data.comment: This is the text in the caption of the importing progress dialog box.

data.name: kstidInitialDifferences
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there are differences between the imported version of a book and the current version

data.name: kstidIntro
data.comment: Text used to partially describe a book reference when the book contains an introduction along with a range of Scripture references (e.g. Imported Books dialog and Saved Versions dialog)

data.name: kstidIntroOnly
data.comment: Text describing a book reference when the book contains only an introduction (e.g. Imported Books dialog and Saved Versions dialog)

data.name: kstidMergeProgress
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when calculating differences for the diff view

data.name: kstidNewBook
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when the imported version of the book is the only one (no pre-existing versions of that book)

data.name: kstidNoDifferencesLeft
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there are no more differences to be reviewed.

data.name: kstidOneInitialDifference
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there is one difference between the imported version of a book and the current version

data.name: kstidOneRemainingDifference
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there is one unreviewed differences between the imported version of a book and the current version after using the Compare and Merge dialog box.

data.name: kstidOverwriteCaption
data.comment: Caption for the progress dialog when overwriting a book

data.name: kstidOverwriting
data.comment: Progress dialog message displayed when overwriting the current version with the saved or imported version.

data.name: kstidOverwrittenFull
data.value: Imported version has replaced current version
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when user has chosen to replace the current version of a book with the imported version

data.name: kstidParatextProjectLoadFailure
data.value: Paratext Project {0} could not be loaded. Please ensure that Paratext is correctly installed and that it can open this project.
data.comment: Error message when we are unable to load a Paratext project

data.name: kstidRemainingDifferences
data.comment: Status value displayed in Imported Book dialog when there are still unreviewed differences between the imported version of a book and the current version after using the Compare and Merge dialog box.

data.name: kstidSaved
data.comment: The article, adjective and noun are included to accomodate languages with different word order.

data.name: kstidSavedVersionDescriptionOriginal
data.comment: Name of saved version that is a copy of original books before import changed them.

data.name: kstidStandardFormatImportSvDesc
data.comment: Default description for saved version created by standard format import.

data.name: kstidStopImporting
data.comment: Stop button text on the import progress dialog.

data.name: kstidStoppingImport
data.comment: Progress bar message

data.name: kstidUnknown
data.comment: Symbol or short string representing an unknown number of unreviewed differences in the Merge Imported Scripture dialog box
